get.summary: List all operations provided by Microsoft.FluidRelay.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

schema.description: Result of GET request to list FluidRelay operations.

value.description: List of FluidRelay operations supported by the Microsoft.FluidRelay provider.

display.description: The object that represents the operation.

resource.description: Type on which the operation is performed, e.g., 'servers'.

operation.description: Operation type, e.g., read, write, delete, etc.

description.description: Description of the operation, e.g., 'Write confluent'.

isDataAction.description: Indicates whether the operation is a data action

nextLink.description: URL to get the next set of operation list results if there are any.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The subscription id (GUID) for this resource.

parameters.name: resourceGroup
parameters.description: The resource group containing the resource.

parameters.name: fluidRelayServerName
parameters.description: The Fluid Relay server resource name.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The API version to use for this operation.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

frsTenantId.description: The Fluid tenantId for this server

fluidRelayEndpoints.description: The Fluid Relay Service endpoints for this server.

encryption.description: All encryption configuration for a resource.

customerManagedKeyEncryption.description: All Customer-managed key encryption properties for the resource.

keyEncryptionKeyIdentity.description: All identity configuration for Customer-managed key settings defining which identity should be used to auth to Key Vault.

identityType.description: Values can be SystemAssigned or UserAssigned

userAssignedIdentityResourceId.description: user assigned identity to use for accessing key encryption key Url. Ex: /subscriptions/fa5fc227-a624-475e-b696-cdd604c735bc/resourceGroups/<resource group>/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myId. Mutually exclusive with identityType systemAssignedIdentity.

keyEncryptionKeyUrl.description: key encryption key Url, with or without a version. Ex: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek/562a4bb76b524a1493a6afe8e536ee78 or https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek. Key auto rotation is enabled by providing a key uri without version. Otherwise, customer is responsible for rotating the key. The keyEncryptionKeyIdentity(either SystemAssigned or UserAssigned) should have permission to access this key url.

storagesku.description: Sku of the storage associated with the resource
storagesku.title: StorageSKU

createdBy.description: The identity that created the resource.

createdByType.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

lastModifiedBy.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedByType.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

lastModifiedAt.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC)

identity.description: The type of identity used for the resource.

principalId.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

type.description: The identity type.

principalId.description: The principal id of user assigned identity.

clientId.description: The client id of user assigned identity.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The list of user identities associated with the resource.

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

location.description: The geo-location where the resource lives

frsTenantId.description: The Fluid tenantId for this server

fluidRelayEndpoints.description: The Fluid Relay Service endpoints for this server.

encryption.description: All encryption configuration for a resource.

customerManagedKeyEncryption.description: All Customer-managed key encryption properties for the resource.

keyEncryptionKeyIdentity.description: All identity configuration for Customer-managed key settings defining which identity should be used to auth to Key Vault.

identityType.description: Values can be SystemAssigned or UserAssigned

userAssignedIdentityResourceId.description: user assigned identity to use for accessing key encryption key Url. Ex: /subscriptions/fa5fc227-a624-475e-b696-cdd604c735bc/resourceGroups/<resource group>/providers/Microsoft.ManagedIdentity/userAssignedIdentities/myId. Mutually exclusive with identityType systemAssignedIdentity.

keyEncryptionKeyUrl.description: key encryption key Url, with or without a version. Ex: https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek/562a4bb76b524a1493a6afe8e536ee78 or https://contosovault.vault.azure.net/keys/contosokek. Key auto rotation is enabled by providing a key uri without version. Otherwise, customer is responsible for rotating the key. The keyEncryptionKeyIdentity(either SystemAssigned or UserAssigned) should have permission to access this key url.
